response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special price tailored just for you.

We kindly propose a purchase price of $950,000 for this remarkable product. This offer reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who appreciates its true worth and aligns with our values.

Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further details. We are here to ensure a smooth and satisfactory transaction for both parties.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
